text: Hangome ki daloili mahkami nuʙuvvati pajomʙar ʙar kofiron arza sud, onon az ruji ʙartarixohi [va hasodat]-e ki ʙajnason ʙud, rohi tafriqa taj namudand va agar farmoni Parvardigorat [dar mavridi muhlat va ta'xiri azoʙ] to zamone muajjan az pes muqarrar nasuda ʙud, [ʙe dirang] mijonason dovari mesud va ammo pas az kofiron [va ʙa daleli inkoru ixtilofi onon] vorisoni kitoʙ [Tavrot va Incil niz] dar mavridi Qur'on saxt dar tardid va ʙadgumoni hastand
